## Source: ossf-package-analysis (924eeec3ead0762c18ae254572edc5e76a3a27d3003bdea3c80eb6902fccf7c8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@callcenter-frontend/api' @ 99.0.2025091-3.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
